amendment.description: To extend through December 31, 2008, the depreciation treatment of leasehold, restaurant, and retail space improvements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 205 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 42. Record Vote Number: 32.

Amendment SA 205 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1152-1155, S1159-1160, S1179-1180; text: CR S1152-1153) To extend through December 31, 2008, the depreciation treatment of leasehold, restaurant, and retail space improvements, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 205 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 42. Record Vote Number: 32.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 205 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 100.
